extendedInfo.description: One day morning, Piggy Bank Peddy leaves his home and hanging around on the street. Suddenly, He sees Piggy Bank Kanaly on the opposite side of street. His heart is almost to jump out because he meets his goddess and attracted by her. He hopes to strike up a conversation with her. Unfortunately, he stumbles and scattered over his coins on the street.     Peddy needs to take back the coins and pursue Kanaly. Can you help him?    The ordered game has total 255 level (17 stages and each stage has 15 level). Peddy uses all tools and takes back the coins. New playing method challenges your IQ. Come on! Let's go to help Peddy now.
